author: andschwa
body: This takes just the `mapping.json` changes from @dgrala's branch. I'm including it now so I can sync the latest sources for everything, per #925. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/926)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Actually, I'll leave this up for @dgrala, but I won't merge until after #925.

comments.author: dgrala
comments.body: There is a small fix for one file in commit 19e8f758d43cdcc379780ce34fb0d8120944cd07. Do you want to include that too?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I did, just squashed it into the original commit.

title: Add PackageManagement sources to mapping.json
